register.description: Contains bits related to control of terminations in USB2PHY

bitfield.description: Override termination resistor trim code with MEM_RTERM_RMX bitfield value
The value written to this field is used as termination resistor trim code if bit [21] MEM_USE_RTERM_RMX_REG is set to 1
Returns the current value of RTERM_RMX

register.description: This is the charger detect register. This register is not used in the dead battery case.

bitfield.description: Use bits 28:24 and 18:17 from this register.
When read, returns current value of charger detect input. When MEM_USE_CHG_DET_REG = 1, the value written to this field overrides the corresponding charger detect input.
When read, returns current value of charger detect input. When MEM_USE_CHG_DET_REG = 1, the value written to this field overrides the corresponding charger detect input.
When read, returns current value of charger detect input. When MEM_USE_CHG_DET_REG = 1, the value written to this field overrides the corresponding charger detect input.
When read, returns current value of charger detect input. When MEM_USE_CHG_DET_REG = 1, the value written to this fileld overrides the corresponding charger detect input.
Restart the charger detection protocol when this bit is set from 0 to 1
Charger detect protocol has completed
Reflects charger-enable (CE) output pin
Output of the data detect comparator
When read, returns current value of charger detect input. When MEM_USE_CHG_DET_REG = 1, the value written to this field overrides the corresponding charger detect input.
When read, returns current value of charger detect input. When MEM_USE_CHG_DET_REG = 1, the value written to this field overrides the corresponding charger detect input.
Comparator on the DP line value
Comparator on the DM line value
Force output pin CE = 1, when this bit is set to 1.

register.description: GPIO mode configurations and read-only info fields

bitfield.description: When set to 1, use bits 30:24 from this register instead of primary inputs.
Overrides the GPIO MODE primary input
Overrides the DP GPIO GZ primary input
Overrides the DM GPIO GZ primary input
Overrides the DP GPIO A primary input
Overrides the DM GPIO A primary input
DP GPIO Y output value status
DM GPIO Y output value status
GPIO mode DM pulldown enabled. Overrides the corresponding primary input.
GPIO mode DP pulldown enabled. Overrides the corresponding primary input.

This bit field can be used to compensate for external Common Mode Filter (CMF) or series switch resistance. Returns 0x0 on read, if VDDLDO is off. Example: If a CMF has series resistance of 4 ohms, that can be compensated by lower the output impedance of the driver by 4 ohms (0x4). It is not recommended to use external components having more than 4-ohm series resistance on DP/DM path. If higher value of series resistance is used, PHY can only compensate that partially by using this option.

register.description: Used to configure and debug the analog blocks

bitfield.description: Following are the bit setting to improve HS eye diagram. These options should be used with higher value of external series resistance on DP/DM.bits [17:15] = 0x0: Default swing enum=Default . bits [17:15] = 0x3: 15-mV differential swing increase enum=15 mV .

register.description: This register contains bits for configuring functionality for CE pad.

bitfield.description: CE pin output mode:0x8 - 0xF: Reserved . 0x10 - 0x28: Debug options .
